question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and look at the sea and turn back to fly over the buildings a trees and pond is visible. now get down on the land and look at the tree. now turn back and fly over the trees and reach the road and turn little right. now move towards the sea and look at the grey building. now turn right side of the building and move between two building and go top the back side of the building. now turn to the building named with drink ice cold and fly over the building and take little right and look at the tall building. now move forwards to the pond is visible and take right and move forward to the roads and take little right and move to the brown building. now turn left and move towards the brown building and stay there.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I turn right toward the brown building and stay there.  
B. I fly over buildings.  
C. I walk toward the sea and look at the gray buildings.  
D. I go to the right side of the building, move between the two buildings, and then reach the top of the back side of the building.  
E. I move across the water.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: A; Reason: The final instruction in the navigation sequence is to "turn left and move towards the brown building and stay there," which aligns with the current visual context showing a close-up of a detailed building, indicating that the agent has reached the final destination as instructed.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(430, 440)]
Option: [A]
Reason: The video shows a close-up of a detailed building, indicating that the agent has reached the final destination as instructed. The final instruction in the navigation sequence is to "turn left and move towards the brown building and stay there," which aligns with the current visual context.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: A; Reason: The final instruction in the navigation sequence is to "turn left and move towards the brown building and stay there," which aligns with the current visual context showing a close-up of a detailed building, indicating that the agent has reached the final destination as instructed.
